test_cases.name: Normal Input
test_cases.input_payload: Hello, this is a safe comment!
test_cases.expected_behavior: Input renders correctly as plain text without any script execution
test_cases.pass_criteria: No alerts triggered, no script tags in DOM, text displayed as-is

test_cases.name: Reflected XSS - Script Tag
test_cases.expected_behavior: Script should be sanitized and not execute
test_cases.pass_criteria: No alert dialog, script tag escaped or removed from DOM

test_cases.name: DOM XSS - innerHTML Injection
test_cases.expected_behavior: Image tag should be sanitized, onerror handler should not execute
test_cases.pass_criteria: No alert triggered, no onerror execution, safe rendering

test_cases.name: Secrets Exposure - API Key Detection
test_cases.expected_behavior: No API keys or secrets visible in DOM, console, or localStorage
test_cases.pass_criteria: No API keys found in page source, console logs, or localStorage

test_cases.name: Malformed Input - Encoded Script
test_cases.expected_behavior: Encoded script should be treated as plain text
test_cases.pass_criteria: No script execution, payload treated as text

test_cases.name: Edge Case - Long String
test_cases.expected_behavior: Long input should be handled gracefully without performance issues
test_cases.pass_criteria: Page renders without errors, reasonable response time

test_cases.name: Edge Case - Special Characters
test_cases.expected_behavior: Special characters should be properly escaped
test_cases.pass_criteria: No script execution, characters properly escaped in DOM
